articles.title: Doctor Who: Jodie Whittaker's replacement 'odds-on' to be David Tennant - Express
articles.description: DOCTOR WHO fans are still none the wiser about who will be replacing Jodie Whittaker, but a previous Doctor, according to leading bookmaker Coral could be time travelling back into the show.
